name: timelessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not change as the years go past, or as fashion changes: In the past, people thought art was something timelessly beautiful. The stars, planets, and galaxies spin timelessly around. See
timeless
More examplesFewer examplesPerhaps no other author has remained so timelessly relevant to contemporary audiences.The fragrance is both sexy and timelessly elegant. The river Tay winds timelessly through Perthshire.
